tests.name: CoveyTownController constructor should set the friendlyName property
CoveyTownController addPlayer should use the coveyTownID and player ID properties when requesting a video token
CoveyTownController destorySession should emit onConversationAreaUpdated to all of the listener
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should change the location of the player
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should emit on player moved
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should emit on updateConversationArea when a player enters a area
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should emit on destroy when last player leaves a area
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should not emit on updateConversationArea when a player moves in a area

CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved updatePlayerLocation when multiple players enter and leaves a conversationArea should add a second player should emit onConversationUpdate when one player leaves and no onConversationDestory should emit onConversationDestroy and no onConversationUpdate when last player leaves
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should remove player from conversation area if player moved to another conversationArea
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should remove players from conversation area if two player left
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should emit the correct conversationArea for onConversationAreaDestroyed
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation updatePlayerLocation when players move and calls on playerMoved should be able to updatePlayerLocation between two conversation area
CoveyTownController town listeners and events should notify added listeners of player movement when updatePlayerLocation is called
CoveyTownController town listeners and events should notify added listeners of player disconnections when destroySession is called
CoveyTownController town listeners and events should notify added listeners of new players when addPlayer is called
CoveyTownController town listeners and events should notify added listeners that the town is destroyed when disconnectAllPlayers is called
CoveyTownController town listeners and events should not notify removed listeners of player movement when updatePlayerLocation is called
CoveyTownController town listeners and events should not notify removed listeners of player disconnections when destroySession is called
CoveyTownController town listeners and events should not notify removed listeners of new players when addPlayer is called
CoveyTownController town listeners and events should not notify removed listeners that the town is destroyed when disconnectAllPlayers is called
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler should reject connections with invalid town IDs by calling disconnect
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler should reject connections with invalid session tokens by calling disconnect
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler with a valid session token should add a town listener, which should emit "newPlayer" to the socket when a player joins
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler with a valid session token should add a town listener, which should emit "playerMoved" to the socket when a player moves
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler with a valid session token should add a town listener, which should emit "playerDisconnect" to the socket when a player disconnects
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler with a valid session token should add a town listener, which should emit "townClosing" to the socket and disconnect it when disconnectAllPlayers is called
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler with a valid session token when a socket disconnect event is fired should remove the town listener for that socket, and stop sending events to it
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler with a valid session token when a socket disconnect event is fired should destroy the session corresponding to that socket
CoveyTownController townSubscriptionHandler with a valid session token should forward playerMovement events from the socket to subscribed listeners
CoveyTownController addConversationArea should add the conversation area to the list of conversation areas
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation should respect the conversation area reported by the player userLocation.conversationLabel, and not override it based on the player's x,y location
CoveyTownController updatePlayerLocation should emit an onConversationUpdated event when a conversation area gets a new occupant
Create Conversation Area API Executes without error when creating a new conversation
conversationAreaCreateHandler Checks for a valid session token before creating a conversation area
